section.header: commission decision of 09-viii-2005 withdrawing, at the holder's request, the marketing authorisation granted by decision c(2001)286 for "tenecteplase boehringer ingelheim pharma gmbh & co. kg - tenecteplase", a medicinal product for human use
section.p: only the german text is authentic

section.header: commission decision of 09-viii-2005 withdrawing, at the holder's request, the marketing authorisation granted by decision c(2001)286 for "tenecteplase boehringer ingelheim pharma gmbh & co. kg - tenecteplase", a medicinal product for human use (text with eea relevance)
section.p: the commission of the european communities, having regard to the treaty establishing the european community,

having regard to council regulation (eec) no 2309/93 of 22 july 1993 laying down community procedures for the authorisation and supervision of medicinal products for human and veterinary use and establishing a european agency for the evaluation of medicinal products 1, having regard to the application submitted by boehringer ingelheim international gmbh on 28 june 2005 with a view to the withdrawal of the marketing authorisation for the medicinal product "tenecteplase boehringer ingelheim pharma gmbh & co. kg - tenecteplase" whereas: (1)

the placing on the market of the medicinal product "tenecteplase boehringer ingelheim pharma gmbh & co. kg - tenecteplase", which is entered in the community register of medicinal products under the numbers eu/1/00/168/001- 006 was authorised by commission decision c(2001)286 of 23 february 2001. (2)

following the holder's request, that authorisation should be withdrawn, has adopted this decision: article 1 at the holder's request, the marketing authorisation granted by decision c(2001)286 of 23 february 2001 for the medicinal product "tenecteplase boehringer ingelheim pharma gmbh & co. kg - tenecteplase" is withdrawn.
1 oj l 214, 24.8.1993, p. 1. regulation as last amended by [regulation (ec) no 1647/2003 (oj l 245, 29.9.2003, p. 19)].

article 2 this decision is addressed to boehringer ingelheim international gmbh, binger strasse 173, d-55216 ingelheim am rhein, deutschland. done at brussels, 09-viii-2005 for the commission g√ºnter verheugen member of the commission
